description: A tool that shows how the image from an outdoor camera it will look (based on data from Google Street View). You can specify camera parameters or select a model from a list (9188 cameras).
drawing circles with a certain radius on the map
Measurement tool for #GoogleMaps.
tool allows you to quickly mark a group of points on the map and then export their geographic coordinates to CSV.
tool for drawing rectangles, circles and complex polygons on a world map to measure their area and perimeter
compare size of two countries
Converts information about labels on Google Maps to CSV or XLSX
Extract data from placemarks
show gpx and tcx files on map
tool for measuring the number of people in a crowd of different area and density.
A tool for automate work with Overpass Turbo. Upload a photo, mark a line on the map roads, railroads, power lines and get a ready-made query to find sections of the map corresponding to the photo.
Choose a city on the world map, then select an address on the map and see what places you can get to by public transport in a certain time interval (range from 1 to 90 minutes)
scalable and secure platform for 3D geospatial data. Upload your content and Cesium ion will optimize it as 3D Tiles, host it in the cloud, and stream it to any device
One of the most powerful map switches I've ever seen. It allows you to see data for the same location in 160+ different services (some of them in Japanese).
Google Chrome extension to switch between dozens of different types of online maps (based on #OpenStreetMap and NOT only)
Simple online map tools: Calculate area (triangles, quadrilaterals and complex polygons), Calculate distance (for complex routes), Measure radius, Calculate elevation
Partly free online tool for creating infographics (images or pdf) based on maps.

One of the main problems of using geospatial data in investigations is the large number of applications for working with it, which save the result in different formats. This multifunctional online geodata converter will help to solve it.

If your Google account has once enabled collecting data about your location (link for checking https://timeline.google.com/maps/timeline), this extension will help you analyze your movement data in depth, and export it to CSV.
This simple online tool shows Open Street Map changes over a certain date range.
geographic toolkit for investigative journalists
Enter search terms (ex "Boston museum") and scrape adresses, phone, websites and other place info from Google Maps.

FREE online tool for creating map-based visualizations: - put labels with names and descriptions - draw lines and routes - choose from hundreds of backgrounds - download your work as PDF, image, GeoJSON or share link to online version

A tool for locating photos and satellite images: Specify the objects you see and the distance between them (ex: a 10-story building 80 meters from a park). Select a search area (ex: a district of a city) Get a list of places that fit the description.
Online tool to calculate the distance a person can travel from a given point in a given time (on foot, by car, by bicycle, by train, by truck).
Old (but it's still working) and simple command line #python tool for access Overpass Turbo API.
